tool_description: Convert Minecraft UUIDs to Usernames and backwards without getting rate-limited by Mojang's session servers
name: Minecraft UUID and Name Fetcher
title: Minecraft UUID and Name Fetcher

api_list.name: Name to UUID conversion
api_list.description: Converts an username to the normal and the trimmed UUID of the player
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com/uuid/Chriis"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com/uuid/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: UUID to Username conversion
api_list.description: Converts a normal or trimmed UUID to the current username of the player.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com/name/a792de55-8320-4958-a111-0708ce9551d2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com/name/{uuid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minecraft-uuid-and-name-fetcher.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
